And then he, paid the Bill and he asked me,
Can we get the check and talk about this at home?

But you, your old man picked up the tab, so now you drive out Old Farm Road 24 once a week to the spot just to remind yourself, keep it fresh in your head, just what a piece of shit you think you are.
The check came and, of course, I was going to pay, but you didn't do the check dance.
And so, Nonou tried to kill you, never in her wildest dreams imagining that you were Kabuto...
Somehow there ended up being 15 or 20 of us at the table... and when the cheque came... it was $9,000.
